text: This week on code faster I wrote about automating tedious tasks like fixing code linting. There's a bit of an irony because I should also automate cross posting, but zapier doesn't support substack cross posting :/. Another reason to look for another more code friendly blogging platform. The other big thing I've noticed is that my posts about a specific software tool do much better than ideas about general techniques. So if something says "vi" or "bash" in the title, it does well. I love tools, so I have no problem writing more tutorials on productive ways to use tools like vi and sed. This week's post for anybody interested: <https://codefaster.substack.com/p/fast-typing-automate-code-fixes>

attachments.title: Automate your code fixes
attachments.text: Stop fixing code by hand and automate it. In this post, weâ€™ll show you how.
